snippet: The winners of league championships in Britain and France depended on an international lineup of stars.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column; winners of league championships in Britain and France depended on an international lineup of stars to put world-class talent on their teams.
lead_paragraph: The winners of league championships in Britain and France depended on an international lineup of stars.

headline.main: Seeking National Glory, Clubs Tap Global Talent
headline.print_headline: Seeking National Glory, Clubs Tap Global Talent
